Package dataAccessObject

Class CustomerDAO

java.lang.Object
dataAccessObject.CustomerDAO
public class CustomerDAO extends Object
Data Access Object (DAO) class for handling operations related to Customer in the database.

    • deleteCustomer

      public static int deleteCustomer(int customerId, Connection connection) throws SQLException
      Deletes a customer from the database. Also Deletes Appointments connected to said Customer.
      Parameters:
      customerId - The ID of the customer to be deleted.
      connection - The database connection.
      Returns:
      The number of rows affected by the delete operation.
      Throws:
      SQLException - If a SQL exception occurs during data deletion.

    • updateCustomer

      public static int updateCustomer(Customer updatedCustomer, Connection connection) throws SQLException
      Updates a customer in the database.
      Parameters:
      updatedCustomer - The updated Customer object.
      connection - The database connection.
      Returns:
      The number of rows affected by the update operation.
      Throws:
      SQLException - If a SQL exception occurs during data update.

      public static int addCustomer(Customer addedCustomer, Connection connection) throws SQLException

      Parameters:
      addedCustomer - The Customer object to be added.
      connection - The database connection.
      Returns:
      The number of rows affected by the insert operation.
      Throws:
      SQLException - If a SQL exception occurs during data insertion.

      public static Customer findCustomerFromId(int customerId) throws SQLException

      Parameters:
      customerId - The ID of the customer.
      Returns:
      The Customer object corresponding to the ID.
      Throws:
      SQLException - If a SQL exception occurs during data retrieval.
